signup.have_an_account: Of, log in op uw account

verify.title: Verify Your Account
verify.success: Your account has been verified successfully
verify.expired-key: This verification link has expired. Please request a new one.
verify.already-verified: This account has already been verified. You can sign in now.
verify.unable-to-verify: Unable to verify account. Please try again or contact support.
verify.check-email: Please check your email for a verification link
verify.error: Account verification failed. Please check your verification link or request a new one.
verify.check-email-help: Check your email for the most recent verification link
verify.check-spam: Check your spam/junk folder if you can't find the email
verify.contact-support: Contact support if you continue to have issues
verify.missing-key-message: Please use the verification link sent to your email address to verify your account.

change-password.title: Change Password
change-password.success: Your password has been changed successfully
change-password.error: Password change failed. Please verify your current password and try again.

close-account.title: Close Account
close-account.warning: This action cannot be undone. All your secrets will be permanently deleted.
close-account.confirm: I understand this action is permanent

passwordReset.emailSent: An email has been sent to you with a link to reset the password for your account
